fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Bite a player at night, thay gain a new role on top of their original one.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The bitten player must complete both of their goals, if their roles' goals are contradictory then they flip a coin.
- You may only bite yourself once.
- You are considered a Vampire role for any roles that interact with them (such as Vampire Hunter).

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Bite five players or make it to the end of the game.
